title: Hair Tamer "No Knot" Pink Detangling Hair Brush Teezer
description: DescriptionHair Tamer  professional detangling hairbrush is designed for professional hair salons. It's a super smooth operator that works the minute hair is lathered and rinsed. Glides through wet, vulnerable and color treated hair with no pulling, tugging or yanking. Hair peace at last!Try the Hair Tamer and you'll be amazed by the ease of brushing, as well as how it virtually stops breakage and split endsFeaturesErgonomic designs.Fits right into the palm of your hand.Detangles hair with ease.Works on even the curliest, most knotted hair.Hair slips through the unique bristle configuration.Gentle & painless.Virtually stops breakage & split ends.Conforms to shape of the head.Added control.SpecificationsLength: 5"Width: 2.25"Height: 2"

title: Hair Tamer Black Diamond Ultra Mist Multi-Use Spray Bottle
description: DescriptionHair Tamer products are designed for for professional hair stylists. Hair Tamers line of salon accessory products such as the Brush, Detangler, Clips, Spray Bottles, all became instant leaders in their categories.FeaturesSuper strong yet ultra light bottle with eye-catching design.Matte finish non-slip coating on the body.  Ensures an easy grip. Innovative Japanese trigger spray delivers ultra fine mist with ease, without drips or off spray.Ultra comfortable grip.Diamond face plate.SpecificationsLength: 2.5"Width: 2"Height: 7.5"Capacity: 8.5 ounces

title: Black Croc Hair Styling Clips - 6 Pack
description: Overview:Every stylist needs clips to section and separate their client's hair for many types of processing. These clips have a unique double-hinged design They have two springs that allow them to automatically adjust to hold any kind of hair regardless of amount, thickness, or type.Features:Unique double-hinged design.Holds large amounts of hair.Perfect for clipping foils up & away during hair color applications.Great for sectioning hair.Works especially well for fine sections & around the hairline.*NOTE: Actual product may differ slightly from the pictured clips.*
